channel.title: Bridge Building Competition - WITH PRIZES :D
channel.description:
Hello, Today I volunteered at Explorathon, and part of the workshop I was helping with was a bridge building contest. I thought it was interesting, so I decided to try it. On the school computer I built several amazing ones, and decided a MITB contest might be fun. Here are my rules: [u][b]BRIDGE BUILDING CONTEST[/b][/u] [b]Software:[/b] West Point Bridge Builder 2007 [http://bridgecontest.usma.edu/download.htm] [b]Rules:[/b] All default settings in the program, or to be more specific: 24 Metres Standard abutments no pier No anchorage Med Strength Concrete Standard Loading [b]Winners include:[/b] Cheapest to work - judged by me Funniest death bridge - Judged by peers Coolest design - Judged by peers Least members - Judged by me Safest - Judged by me/peers Most unique - Judged by peers And more awards can be added if wanted. [b]WHY?[/b] [u][b]REWARDS OF COURSE![/b][/u] Yes, I will give rewards to the winners.
Have fun! Deadline is... end of the month, you can submit as many entries as you would like. EDIT: Email all saved files to justis@4EverScape.Com, or send a pm with the link.

item.title: Bridge Building Competition - WITH PRIZES :D
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hello,
Today I volunteered at Explorathon, and part of the workshop I was helping with was a bridge building contest. I thought it was interesting, so I decided to try it. On the school computer I built several amazing ones, and decided a MITB contest might be fun. Here are my rules:
BRIDGE BUILDING CONTEST
Software:
West Point Bridge Builder 2007 [http://bridgecontest.usma.edu/download.htm]
Rules:
All default settings in the program, or to be more specific:
24 Metres
Standard abutments
no pier
No anchorage
Med Strength Concrete
Standard Loading
Winners include:
Cheapest to work - judged by me
Funniest death bridge - Judged by peers
Coolest design - Judged by peers
Least members - Judged by me
Safest - Judged by me/peers
Most unique - Judged by peers
And more awards can be added if wanted.
WHY?
REWARDS OF COURSE!
Yes, I will give rewards to the winners.

Have fun! Deadline isâ€¦ end of the month, you can submit as many entries as you would like.
EDIT:
Email all saved files to justis@4EverScape.Com, or send a pm with the link.
